description: T1- YewCrown Reduction - Reducing the height and spread of the tree by up to 2m. Final height 6m and spread 3mT5- Laurel and PyracanthaCrown Reduction - Reducing the height and spread of the tree by up to 2m. Final height 6m and spread 3mGeneral Maintenance.
